Class TextElement

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes

FlowGraph.Core.dll

A text shape element for displaying standalone text on the canvas.

public class TextElement : ShapeElement, ICanvasElement, INotifyPropertyChanged

Examples

// Create a diagram title
var title = new TextElement("title-1")
{
    Position = new Point(50, 20),
    Text = "System Architecture",
    FontSize = 24,
    FontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
    Fill = "#2c3e50"
};

// Create an annotation
var note = new TextElement("note-1")
{
    Position = new Point(200, 300),
    Text = "TODO: Add error handling",
    FontSize = 12,
    FontStyle = FontStyle.Italic,
    Fill = "#e74c3c"
};

Remarks

TextElement is useful for: - Annotations and comments - Diagram titles and labels - Swimlane headers - Free-form notes

Unlike node labels, TextElement exists independently and can be positioned anywhere on the canvas without being attached to a node.

Type

Gets the type identifier for this element.

public override string Type { get; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

Used by renderer registries to select the appropriate renderer. For nodes, this typically comes from the node definition's Type property. For shapes, this identifies the shape type (line, rectangle, text, etc.).
